alert.note: Alert for Muscogee (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 12 at 6:20PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Muscogee County through 645 PM EDT... At 620 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was over Monterey Heights, or over Smiths, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...40 to 50 mph wind, up to penny sized hail and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect minor damage to tree limbs and blowing around of light, unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Columbus, Bibb City, Saint Marys Hills, Edgewood, Highland Park, Laurel Hills, Green Island Hills, Vista Terrace, Columbus Metropolitan Airport, Rose Hill, Kenwood, Benning Hills, Avondale, Benning Park, and Carter Acres. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: People outdoors should seek shelter immediately. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
